analysis.strip_only_vs_full: Strip-Only has same ASR as No Defense (22.0%), proving forced enum/const literals are the key attack vector. Metadata stripping alone is insufficient.
analysis.delex_all_vs_full: Delex-All achieves 0% ASR but 35.5% benign modification rate (vs 1.1%) and lower utility (-0.9pp validity, -1.0pp compliance). Selective delexicalization preserves utility.
analysis.heuristic_only_vs_full: Heuristic-Only is identical to Full DeLex-JSON. Rule-based heuristic alone is sufficient without guard model.
